title: video setting on client
body:
Riot pls make in client settings ,go to in game settings, that you can change video settings for game .
Pls make that because my resolution oln lol is to big for my monitor so i cant change it and i cant play league then.
Pls respond.

replies.body:
Sorry for the hassle you've had trying to adjust your resolution.  You should be able to reset your resolution to default by resetting your config.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Some in-game video settings are also available through the client options as well!  I hope that helps!
thank you very much , it works fine now :)
